title: Team Budgets
content: FIRST Lego League Category Item Price Fees Team Registration $275.00 Product Challenge Set $95.00 LEGO Education Spike Prime $570.90 Engineering Notebooks $54.00 Meeting Fees Mentor payment over the season TBD Associated Workspace fees TBD

title: Mentorship Opportunities
description: Our mentorship program connects students with experienced professionals and educators in STEM fields. Mentors provide guidance, share expertise, and inspire innovation, helping students achieve their full potential.
content:
MENTORING THE NEXT GENERATION IN STEM Mentors provide guidance, share expertise, and inspire innovation, helping students achieve their full potential.
Introducing the youth to STEM Mentorship opportunities provided by STEM competitions and the teamwork required to surpass such challenges allow for students to develop necessary STEM skills.
Learning is experience. Everything else is just information.ALbert Einstein
